entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:46 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
